name: Slovakia
startIntroPart1: Hail, leader! It's Svatopluk the Great, leader of the Slovak people!
declaringWar: Your lands will soon be part of Slovakia
attacked: He who plays with fire, soon gets burnt into it
defeated: I have betrayed my people. May God have mercy on my soul
introduction: Hail, leader! It's Svatopluk the Great, leader of the Slovak people!
neutralYes: For the benefit of my people.
afterPeace: Maybe you aren't the coward I thought you were.
tradeRequest: I bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
unique: Receive a free Great Prophet <after researching [Writing]>
